sn10.11:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava rajagahe viharati veluvane kalandakanivape.
sn10.11:1.3: Tena kho pana samayena annataro upasako ciraya bhikkhuniya civaram adasi.
sn10.11:1.4: Atha kho ciraya bhikkhuniya abhippasanno yakkho rajagahe rathikaya rathikam singhatakena singhatakam upasankamitva tayam velayam imam gatham abhasi:
